nodes.text: The Zakuul Hovercraft was a multi-purpose repulsorcart model used by the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. A number of Zakuul Hovercrafts were deployed during the Assault on Odessen in 3630 BBY.

Zakuul Hovercrafts appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during "Chapter VIII: End Times". They are also available as housing decorations from the Vigilant Defender Pack, which identifies them by name.
